name: GradientFill
desc: The properties shared by all gradient fill types.

items.name: colorStops
items.desc: An array of color stops. Each stop sets a color and location along the gradient.Provide at least 2 colorStop items.

items.name: type
items.desc: The type of gradient; for example linear_gradient.

items.name: attachment
items.desc: A string that indicates how the fill should behave when a user scrolls. Valid values:scroll (default). The fill scrolls along with its component.fixed. The fill stays at a fixed position within the viewport.
